column3: The worst men often give the best advice.
The best things in life are silly.
Everybody's got a job to do, and I do mine as best I can.
I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that's fine.
The best thing about animals is that they don't talk much.
The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
Culture is the habit of being pleased with the best and knowing why.
One of the best things to do sometimes is simply to be.
The best way to navigate through life is to give up all of our controls.
Most of the things we decide are not what we know to be the best. We say yes, merely because we are driven into a corner and must say something.
Just do what you do best.
